## Instructions

Watch the videos linked below, follow along with the exercises, and submit a link to your toyPipeline repository from GitHub.

* [Intro to learning git](https://youtu.be/KmlnvZF5EcM)
* [Version control with git](https://youtu.be/T2LQlQ6L8ls)

## Grading
* For full credit
  * Submit your repository on time.
  * Your repository should contain:
    * Multiple commits
    * At least one conflict
    * A .gitignore file.
